Stella Ford Mugabo (Amụrụ n'afọ 1962) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Rwanda nke jere ozi dị ka Minista nke Mmekọrịta nke Cabinet kemgbe ọnwa Julaị afọ 2013.

A mụrụ Mugabo n'afọ 1962 na Uganda na Francis Ford Gashumba na Stella Mukamutara. O nwere akara ugo mmụta na agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum Makerere na Master of Arts na Economics and Social Studies na Mahadim Manchester
Mugabo rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nyocha iwu ọha na eze maka ọfịs onye isi ala nke Uganda, wee bụrụ onye na-edeba aha agụmakwụkwọ na Kigali Institute of Science, Technology and Management

Ọ bụ onye isi odeakwụkwọ nke Public Sector Capacity Building Secretariat site n'ọnwa Machị 2010 ruo afọ 2014. Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ Rwanda Institute of Administration and Management na onye otu ụlọ ọrụ nke Rwanda's Capacity Building Programme.
